gobblin.runtime.api

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GobblinInstanceLauncher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfigurableImpl, FlowSpec, JobSpec, ResolvedJobSpec, StandardGobblinInstanceLauncher, TopologySpec

    @Alpha
public interface Configurable
    A generic interface for any class that can be configured using a Config.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Config getConfig()
      The configuration
      Properties getConfigAsProperties()
      The configuration as properties collection for backwards compatibility.
